array.text: You've reached the final stage. Unable to challenge further.
An error occurred while connecting to App Store.
An error occurred while connecting to Google Play.
No selectable markets.
An error occurred while selecting market to proceed with purchase.
An error occurred while processing purchase from App Store.
An error occurred while processing purchase from Google Play.
An error occurred while processing completed purchase information received from Google Play.
An error occurred while processing purchase recovery from Google Play.

Please check if the item to be processed as a completed purchase was purchased through an invalid route.
If the error occurs continuously when closing an item that was purchased through a valid route, please contact Hive.
Insufficient information to execute showConflictSelection API.
You have canceled conflict relief.
An error occurred on the provider's side while attempting to connect during account switching.
Invalid communication response data for switching accounts.
Insufficient information to execute ShowProfile API.
Web view display ended.
An error occurred while displaying web view.
An error occurred while connecting to provider.
You have already read the permission notice, or logged in from a region where displaying the permission notice is not required.
An error occurred while logging in with Facebook.
You have canceled connecting to a Facebook account.
Unable to receive user information from Facebook after logging in.
You have canceled connecting to an Apple account.

Failed to log in with Apple.
This issue may occur if your current device is not connected to an Apple account.

Invalid login request information sent to Apple.
Failed to log in with Hive.
Failed to disconnect from your Hive account.
Failed to disconnect from your Apple account.
Failed to disconnect from your Google account.

Multiple purchases have already been made.

If you aren't logged in with Google, please log in from your device's settings and then restart the game.
